title: 50,000 LP Gas cylinders to the market today (31)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas said that 50,000 domestic gas cylinders will be distributed to the market on Tuesday (31).
60% of the products will be distributed to the Colombo and Gampaha districts.
The Chairman of Litro said that another vessel carrying 3,950 MT of gas has reached the country on Monday (30) and the unloading commenced on the same day.
He further said another vessel carrying 2,500 MT of gas is scheduled to reach the country by the weekend.
Cabinet approves Ranil’s proposal to amend Acts to increase state revenue
